desc: We cater private events and parties, as well as ship our delicious arancini directly to your door. Order today to try these authentic Italian flavors of our Sicilian Riceballs and make sure to catch us at a food truck event near you by subscribing here or following us on Facebook and Instagram.

layout.text: Book Us Today For Your Private Events
Use Promo Code: Event100 For $100 any party of 50 people or more
